scenario_text.value: What about this, Minoru? Is it safe to eat?

Hey, that’s butterbur! We can eat it all
right, but it’s normally a winter plant.

I gotta say, I don’t know what’s going on
with this forest.

The important thing is we can eat it. It’s a
good thing you know so much, or we’d starve.

What? Aw, come on, now you’ve got me feeling
all self-conscious...

No! Stop! That’s monkshood! It’s super
poisonous!

(Sounds like they’re having a good time with
this.)

(Minoru and Falcomon seem to be enjoying
themselves. I wonder what they’re doing?)
